titleStmt.title: The vvofull lamentation of William Purcas, vvho for murtherin [sic] his mother at Thaxted in Essex was executed at Chelmsford. To the tune of, The rich merchant.
titleStmt.author: Purcas, William.

publicationStmt.publisher: For Francis Coules, dvvelling in the Old-Baily.,

notesStmt.note: In two parts, separated for mounting; woodcuts at head of each part.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
